long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the power of your financial data directly into your Gmail inbox. The Tesorio Gmail extension allows Users to quickly interact and leverage associated Invoice & Customer data hosted in the Tesorio application.

This version provides support for:
- Shared team Gmail accounts - example: accounting@acme.com
- Invoice/Customer record assignment within Tesorio
- Ability to attach files/statements associated with the linked Invoice/Customer record
